targets.rawSql:
select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REBAJADAS FLAMAR'
order by mast.time asc

select  mast.state from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where time between now() - interval '20s' and now() and mach.description = 'REBAJADAS MATRIX'
order by mast.time asc

select count(mach.id) as "Machines"
	from machines mach

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Online with PO"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('5')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '12s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Online without PO"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('4')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '12s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Idle machine"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('2')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '12s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Stopped machine"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('3')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '12s' and now()

select count(distinct mach.id) as "Offline"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where state in ('0','1')
and mast."time" between now() - interval '12s' and now()
